name: Macedonia
description:
In Macedonia, you solve short but challenging puzzles by going up and down elevators, jumping on trampolines, and controlling the effects of the fruit that you gather.

Controls & gameplay

Use A and D to move you character left and right, and W, S to interact with things like buttons and elevators. Using the mouse you can change the effects of the various fruit present on the level; drag an existing fruit onto a nearby checkbox, and all fruits of the same type will gain the effect corrisponding to that checkbox. Effects include making you bigger, putting you in a bubble to fly, creating a clone...

What's in the game

  • 28 unique, fine-tuned puzzles
  • 10 different fruit effects
  • 12 super good jazz tracks

For those wondering: "macedonia" means "fruit salad" in Italian and Spanish.
